name: IceD Coffee
description:
General

This game was made for Trijam #156. Theme was: "Tea time". If you wonder, how the game meets theme, check the game lore.

Lore

You are a coffee cup and you fell in love with teapod. You have to get upgrades and get trough lava passage.

Controls

I recommend to kill all enemies.

  • A/D to move
  • Space to jump
  • Left Mouse to shoot
  • E to dash (after you unlock it)
  • Go to coffee machine to heal
